duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership and guidance to LPNs and medical assistant staff to ensure all patient care is of the highest quality.
Coordinate patient care and ensure that all treatments and interventions are delivered in a timely effective manner.
Oversee staff scheduling needs for all departments where oversight is being provided.
Work on the clinic floor and fill in during staff absences when needed.
Triage and treat patients as needed to enhance clinical workflow.
Educate patients and their families on their condition, treatment options, and self-care strategies.
Maintain accurate and complete patient records and ensuring that patient confidentiality is always maintained.
Collaborate with healthcare providers to develop and implement patient care plans in partnership with our CCM program.
Perform all other duties as assigned by the Director of Clinical Operations.

education_certification.credential: RN/BSN with three to five years of experience
